bibl.title: Cablegram (Telegram) from Luis B. Pogolotti to Philip Showalter Hench, October 24, 1940

div1.p: Pogolotti informs Hench that Macia will donate his portion of the Camp Lazear property and thinks Macia's partner will do the same.
